Agenda

Rails World featured two full days of keynotes, talks, workshops, sessions and more. All sessions on the two main stages were recorded and will be shared soon.

Thursday, October 5th

  • Wednesday

    October 4th

  • Thursday

    October 5th

  • Friday

    October 6th

Schedule is in Central European Summer Time (CEST)

  • 09:00 - 10:00

    Doors Open

  • 10:00 - 11:00

    Rails World Opening Keynote

    David Heinemeier Hansson, Rails Core, CTO, 37signals

  • 11:00 - 11:40

    Strada - Bridging the Web and Native Worlds

    Jay Ohms, Mobile Lead / Principal Programmer, 37signals

  • 11:00 - 11:30

    SolidCache - A Disk Backed Rails Cache

    Donal McBreen, Senior Programmer in the SIP team, 37signals

  • 11:45 - 12:25

    Making a Difference with Turbo

    Jorge Manrubia, Lead programmer, 37signals

  • 11:45 - 12:15

    Everything We Learned While Implementing ActiveRecord::Encryption

    Kylie Stradley, Senior Product Security Engineer, GitHub

  • 12:30 - 13:30

    Lunch

  • 13:30 - 14:00

    The Future of Rails as a Full-stack Framework Powered by Hotwire

    Marco Roth, Independent Consultant & Open Source Contributor, Toolsday GmbH

  • 13:30 - 14:00

    Migrating Shopify’s Core Rails Monolith to Trilogy

    Adrianna Chang, Senior Software Developer, Shopify

  • 13:30 - 14:30

    Workshop - Test Smarter, Not Harder - Crafting a Test Selection Framework from Scratch

    Christian Bruckmayer, Staff Engineer, Shopify

  • 14:15 - 14:45

    Building an Offline Experience with a Rails-powered PWA

    Alicia Rojas, Software Engineer, Telos Labs

  • 14:15 - 14:45

    Guardrails - Keeping Customer Data Separate in a Multi Tenant System

    Miles McGuire, Staff Engineer, Intercom

  • 14:45 - 16:15

    Workshop - AI Driven Development

    Sean Marcia, Founder, Ruby for Good

  • 15:00 - 15:30

    Implementing Native Composite primary Key Support in Rails 7.1

    Nikita Vasilevsky, Developer, Shopify

  • 15:00 - 15:30

    Zeitwerk Internals

    Xavier Noria, Rails Core, Independent Consultant

  • 15:45 - 16:15

    Using Multiple Databases with Active Record

    Julia López, Senior Software Engineer, Harvest

  • 15:45 - 16:15

    Propshaft and the Modern Asset Pipeline

    Breno Gazzola, Co-Founder & CTO, FestaLab

  • 16:30 - 17:15

    Day 1 Closing Keynote - The Magic of Rails

    Eileen Uchitelle, Rails Core & Senior Staff Engineer, Shopify
